name: Battle Pong (Jason Lavoie)
description:
Battle Pong is a fast-paced, power-up filled take on the classic game, Pong.

This was my first stab at learning C# and using Unity to create a small test project. If you have any feedback / critiques etc. I'd be more than happy to hear them.

The awesome Music created by - Skip (http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Skip/)
The awesome Sound Effects created by - Fins (https://www.freesound.org/people/fins/)

You can check out my work at - www.JasonLavoie.net
You can check out my dev blog at - http://jasonlavoie3d.tumblr.com/
You can find me on twitter at - https://twitter.com/JasonLavoie3D

Thanks!
